entry.title: Combined summary - Softfork signaling improvements
entry.summary: Douglas Roark from Armory Technologies is interested in a new proposal by Pieter that allows multiple softforks to be deployed simultaneously. He read about this proposal on a post made by Greg on bitcointalk.org but couldn't find the actual proposal anywhere after searching through various sources such as mailing lists, Reddit, IRC logs, BIPs, and Bitcointalk forums. Douglas signs off with his contact details and PGP key ID, indicating his willingness to connect with anyone who has information on the proposal.
